content.raw:
This fixes it for me. 

```

diff --git a/subt_ign/src/GameLogicPlugin.cc b/subt_ign/src/GameLogicPlugin.cc
--- a/subt_ign/src/GameLogicPlugin.cc
+++ b/subt_ign/src/GameLogicPlugin.cc
@@ -931,4 +931,5 @@ void GameLogicPluginPrivate::Finish()
   req.set_pause(true);
-  this->node.Request(
-      std::string("/world/") + this->worldName + "/control", req);
+  this->node.Request<ignition::msgs::WorldControl, ignition::msgs::Boolean>(
+      std::string("/world/") + this->worldName + "/control", req,
+      [](const ignition::msgs::Boolean &, const bool) { });
 
@@ -951,2 +952,3 @@ void GameLogicPluginPrivate::Finish()
         currTime - this->startTime).count();
+    simElapsed = this->simTime.sec() - this->startSimTime.sec();
```

 
It was also printing this:

> Msg] Scoring has finished. Elapsed real time: 14 seconds. Elapsed sim time: 0 seconds.

`simElapsed` wasn't being computed. The above diff also includes a fix for this.
